featured.text: Helen _____ with anger when she saw her boyfriend kissing an attractive girl.

definition.zh_def: 用嘴唇輕觸或接觸某人或某物，通常表示愛或友好。
definition.en_def: To touch or press one's lips against someone or something, typically as a sign of affection or greeting.
definition.example: She gave him a quick kiss on the cheek before leaving.
